title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Centralize Multicloud Management using AWS (COP342)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 集中管理多云环境 (COP342)
abstract: Operating in a multicloud environment can introduce operational complexity. In this session, learn to streamline operations with AWS Systems Manager, which allows for easier instance management across all environments. Gain insights into performance with Amazon CloudWatch and Amazon Managed Grafana, which delivers a unified dashboard of metrics and logs from any data source. With these services, you can simplify day-to-day tasks, maintain control, and optimize resources; whether your workloads span AWS, on-premises, or multiple clouds. Take the complexity out of multicloud and focus on what really matters—running your business.
abstract_cn: 在多云环境中运营可能会带来操作复杂性。在本次会议中，了解如何使用 AWS Systems Manager 简化操作，它可以更轻松地管理所有环境中的实例。通过 Amazon CloudWatch 和 Amazon Managed Grafana 获得性能洞察，后者可提供来自任何数据源的指标和日志的统一仪表板。借助这些服务，您可以简化日常任务、保持控制并优化资源；无论您的工作负载跨越 AWS、本地还是多个云。消除多云的复杂性，专注于真正重要的事情——运营您的业务。

presenter.name: Erik Weber
presenter.title: Sr. WW Specialist SA, Cloud Operations
